thread.section_title: Hotel Darcet - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent service, centrally located.
thread.title_full: Excellent service, centrally located. - Review of Hotel Darcet, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ioanna K
title: Excellent service, centrally located.
text: Excellent service and very clean. Centrally located at Place de Clichy Metro Station, super markets around, 2min walk from Moulin Rouge, 5 min walk from picturesque Monmartre. Place de Clichy is a central Metro station and leads to the major places at the heart of Paris.
